posts.title: Whether you’re going through a break up, you’ve just lost your job, or you simply woke up feeling a little insecure this morning—we’ve all had these days.
The waves were crashing on the shore; it was a lovely sight.
I really want to go to work, but I am too sick to drive.
We have a lot of rain in June.
She works two jobs to make ends meet; at least, that was her reason for not having time to join us.
The body may perhaps compensates for the loss of a true metaphysics.
I often see the time 11:11 or 12:34 on clocks.
I think I will buy the red car, or I will lease the blue one.
A song can make or ruin a person’s day if they let it get to them.
Malls are great places to shop; I can find everything I need under one roof.
The clock within this blog and the clock on my laptop are 1 hour different from each other.
Sometimes it is better to just walk away from things and go back to them later when you’re in a better frame of mind.
Don't step on the broken glass.
I hear that Nancy is very pretty.
I am happy to take your donation; any amount will be greatly appreciated.
Answer the phone in a cheerful voice – even if it is a sales person.
